get.summary: Get list of customers connected to bank
get.description: This use case provides a Bank to view the Customers associated with it. A customer is said to be associated with a bank when the bank is the one which adds the customer. A bank is said to be associated with a customer, if the customer was added by the bank.

post.description: After logging in, a bank can now ‘Add customer’ whose data it needs to monitor. This creates a customer with the given details. The reset password link will be sent to the customer through mail enabling the customer to login into the product after initial reset.
